snippet: Household net worth in the United States returned to record levels in the first quarter, but average household wealth remains well below the 2007 peak when adjusted for inflation.
lead_paragraph: Household net worth in the United States returned to record levels in the first quarter, but average household wealth remains well below the 2007 peak when adjusted for inflation.

headline.seo: Off the Charts: The Old Get Richer, but Not the Young
headline.main: Off the Charts: The Old Get Richer, but Not the Young
